content: Kathryn Alexander, I don’t think she’s whining at all. You should be able to march on your own free will at your time. March when you feel the right to march, not for the sake of being a sheep. Whether you marched or not today, Danielle has the right to free speech on an platform like Medium just as you do to march today. PS This isn’t a personal attack at you in any way. I hope you don’t take it personal.
